backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing per-user contacts and call sessions with access control, including create/list/delete contacts and create/join call sessions.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-generated report mapping implemented features to related source files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining light/dark theme tokens using OKLCH values and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point setting mobile-friendly meta tags and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages with authentication wrapping and global theme/toast providers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the shared app layout with header branding and optional auth status display.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Displays the signed-in principal and sign-out action, clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/CallControls.tsx: Renders in-call action buttons for mute, camera toggle, speaker placeholder, and ending the call.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Form for adding a contact with name and handle fields and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/ContactsList.tsx: Displays a list of contacts with avatars and a delete button, or an empty state if none exist.
frontend/src/components/JoinCodeCard.tsx: Shows a shareable call link with copy-to-clipboard functionality and visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/LocalVideoPrevie: Manages and displays a local camera preview with loading, error, and unsupported states.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Protects routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and showing a loading state during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/SessionStatusPan: Displays call session status, timestamps, and peer info with state-based badges and messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallSessions.ts: Provides mutations and queries for creating, joining, ending, and polling call sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useContacts.ts: Fetches, creates, and deletes contacts while updating react-query cache and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CallEndedPage.tsx: Displays a call-ended message and offers navigation to start a new call or return to contacts.
frontend/src/pages/CallSetupPage.tsx: Provides UI to create or join a call session using session codes and user names.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Manages and displays contacts with options to create new contacts, delete existing ones, and start new calls.
frontend/src/pages/InCallPage.tsx: Handles the in-call experience, including video preview, call controls, session state, and ending calls.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Renders the sign‑in flow using Internet Identity with a branded welcome screen.
frontend/src/utils/principalFormat.ts: Shortens a principal ID by returning only its first two segments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project version, required images, and a list of existing features for a FaceTime‑like cross‑platform web app, including auth, contacts, UI flows, and call sessions.
